name: R5-CareTeamStatus-R4-CareTeamStatus
title: Concept map to convert a FHIR R5 CareTeamStatus into a FHIR R4 CareTeamStatus

element.display: The care team is currently participating in the coordination and delivery of care.

target.display: The care team is currently participating in the coordination and delivery of care.

element.display: The care team should have never existed.

target.display: The care team should have never existed.

element.display: The care team was, but is no longer, participating in the coordination and delivery of care.

target.display: The care team was, but is no longer, participating in the coordination and delivery of care.

element.display: The care team has been drafted and proposed, but not yet participating in the coordination and delivery of patient care.

target.display: The care team has been drafted and proposed, but not yet participating in the coordination and delivery of patient care.

element.display: The care team is temporarily on hold or suspended and not participating in the coordination and delivery of care.

target.display: The care team is temporarily on hold or suspended and not participating in the coordination and delivery of care.
